description: This file implements a Qt6 application that displays a simple welcome window with styled labels. It defines a WelcomeWidget class with a constructor setting up a vertical layout containing two labels, and a main function that initializes and shows this widget.

classes.name: WelcomeWidget
classes.description: A QWidget subclass that creates a welcome message interface with styled QLabel components arranged vertically.

methods.name: WelcomeWidget::WelcomeWidget
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the layout and labels for the welcome widget with specific styles.

methods.name: int main(int argc,char * argv[])
methods.description: Entry point of the application that initializes QApplication, creates a WelcomeWidget instance, displays it, and starts the event loop.
